title: Medical Education (CME) Paper Writing: Self-Directed Learning Based on Multimedia Interactions

context.prior_knowledge: Clinical healthcare practice experience and basic knowledge of academic paper writing
context.additional_context: Non-degree educational program for healthcare managers/leaders conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can draft manuscripts applying the core structure of CME papers (introduction-methods-results-discussion) and medical ethics standards.
Learners can design interactive online learning materials using multimedia elements (videos, infographics).
Learners can improve the clarity and practicality of CME papers through formative assessments incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
